question: I am 26 weeks with boy #2 and had an ob appointment I have gained 7 lbs since Monday and my blood pressure was 142/70 I am so worried that this is going to be preeclampsia again as I developed with my first boy they drew some blood and should have the results tomorrow my blood pressure didn't start to go up this early last time also baby has been measuring big since about 20to weeks hubby has been teasing that baby is gonna be like 14lbs I can't stop stressing out about this
title: freaking out
